Version 1.7.23 - Moodle Presence Tracking via Sessions

New API functions to make SmartLearning users appear "online" in Moodle

New Functions:

  • local_sm_estratoos_plugin_start_session - Create a session in mdl_sessions (user goes "online")
  • local_sm_estratoos_plugin_session_heartbeat - Update session timestamp (keep user "online")
  • local_sm_estratoos_plugin_end_session - Delete session (user goes "offline")

How It Works:

SmartLearning calls start_session when users begin using the platform, session_heartbeat every 5 minutes, and end_session when they leave. This creates records in Moodle's mdl_sessions table, making users appear in "users online" blocks and presence reports.

Session ID Convention:

Sessions created by SmartLearning use a slp_ prefix (SmartLearning Presence) to distinguish them from browser sessions.
